alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sarasota County through 245 PM EDT... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Myakka River State Park to 6 miles south of Gulf Gate Estates. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Gulf Gate Estates, The Meadows, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Ridge Wood Heights, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, South Sarasota, Kensington Park, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, Southgate, Myakka River State Park, Osprey, Gator Creek Estate, Vamo, Laurel, Oscar Scherer State Park and Bee Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Sarasota
